column1: #Text=Katara says : " So , how much for the , uh , traded scroll ? "
#Text=Pirate captain says : " I 've already got a buyer , a nobleman in the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=Let 's say to the price of , one copper piece !
#Text=" Pirate captain says : " The price is two hundred gold pieces .
#Text=I do n't haggle on items this rare .
#Text=" Aang says : " Okay , two copper pieces !
#Text=" Pirate captain says : " It 's not as amusing the second time , boy !
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , can we get out of here ?
#Text=I feel like we 're getting weird looks .
#Text=" Aang says : " Aye , we be casting off now !
